entry.def: Pecans or pecan nuts are nuts with a thin, smooth shell that grow on trees in the southern United States and central America and that you can eat.

means.word_mean: 2. tree of southern United States and Mexico cultivated for its nuts
3. smooth brown oval nut of south central United States
